Uses of Package
atomica.logic

Packages that use atomica.logic
atomica.logic Provides model classes with application logic. 
atomica.ui Provides all classes for the user interface (view). 
atomica.ui.util Provides help classes for the view. 
atomica.ui.util.board Provides classes for the user interface of a game board. 
 

Classes in atomica.logic used by atomica.logic
Editor.EditorMode
          The different modes of an Editor.
 

Classes in atomica.logic used by atomica.ui
Editor
          The class contains the application logic for creating an initial game situation.
Game
          The class represents a running Game.
 

Classes in atomica.logic used by atomica.ui.util

          Simple class for De-/Serialization of a GameSituation object into/from a binary file.
